programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo, (2006, Sci-Fi Horror)

programme.title: Naruto encontra um jovem que est ferido e que perdeu a memria. Tsunade cautelosa com a presena do menino, mas Naruto fica impressionado pela bondade do garoto e insiste que ele fique.

programme.sub-title: A Terra Onde Uma Vez o Heri Viveu

programme.sub-title: O Jutsu Secreto De Haku: Espelhos De Cristal De Gelo

programme.sub-title: O Ninja Nmero Um Hiper Ativo E Cabea Oca Entram Na Briga

programme.title: Vendo que no h tempo a perder, Kakashi decide usar o Sharingan mais uma vez para derrotar Zabuza. Mas Zabuza um ninja experiente em batalhas mortais e, na primeira vez em que enfrentou o Sharingan, Zabuza conseguiu bolar uma estratgia.

programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin

programme.desc: Naruto: Identifique-Se : Novos E Poderosos Rivais

programme.sub-title: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke

programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam

programme.sub-title: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea

programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada

programme.title: Na floresta da morte comea a segunda parte da Prova Chunin. Cada time recebe um tipo de pergaminho e deve roubar o outro tipo de outro time, chegando ao ponto final na torre com os dois pergaminhos.

programme.title: A segunda parte da prova comea na floresta da morte. Sasuke nota que um inimigo se disfarou de Naruto. Sasuke salva e desamarra Naruto, e os trs membros criam uma senha para quando ficarem separados outra vez.

programme.desc: Naruto: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!
programme.sub-title: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!

programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago

programme.title: Megalodon, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma embarcao militar em busca de um submersvel no identificado encontra-se cara a cara com um tubaro gigante, forado a usar apenas o que tem a bordo para se defender da besta monstruosa.

programme.title: Planeta dos Tubares, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Em um futuro prximo, o derretimento glacial cobrir 98% da massa terrestre. Tubares floresceram e agora dominam o planeta, operando como uma enorme escola liderada por um tubaro alfa mutante.

programme.title: A Invaso, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que sua pequena cidade australiana aniquilada por um ataque areo avassalador, um grupo de civis foge da captura e descobre que agora esto entre os ltimos sobreviventes de uma invaso extraterrestre que engolfou todo o planeta.

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City, (2021, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Os Guardies, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: A histria ambientada na Guerra Fria e acompanha um esquadro de heris reunidos pela extinta Unio Sovitica. Depois de passar anos escondendo suas identidades, eles tero enfrentar uma perigosa fora do passado.

programme.title: O Som do Trovo, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: No ano de 2055, o esporte predileto dos ricos viajar no tempo para caar dinossauros. A diverso tem apenas uma regra: proibido trazer do passado qualquer lembrancinha, viva ou morta, j que isto geraria uma srie de reaes que modificaria o presente

programme.title: Voo 7500, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um voo sai dos Estados Unidos para o Japo, durante as dez horas de voo os passageiros pensam em como se distrair ... at perceberem uma presena estranha e sobrenatural dentro do avio.

programme.title: O Contgio, (2015, Adventure)
programme.desc: Uma adolescente contaminada por um zumbi, mas sua transformao demora seis meses para se completar. Mesmo assim, seu pai decide continuar ao seu lado enquanto ela deve se acostumar sua nova personalidade monstruosa.

programme.title: Proposta Indecente, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Demi Moore e Woody Harrelson so Diana e David Murphy, um casal com problemas financeiros que esto apostando numa viagem rpida a Las Vegas para conseguir uma boa mo no jogo de cartas.

programme.title: Temporada de Caa, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Wade Whitehouse um policial de uma pequena cidade. Isolado das pessoas ao seu redor, incluindo um pai dominador e uma mulher divorciada, ele se torna obcecado com a resoluo de um acidente de caa fatal, levando a uma srie de acontecimentos trgicos.

programme.title: Tormenta, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1961, adolescentes viajam no "Albatroz", um navio-escola com um capito severo.O medo inicial se transforma em respeito, mas uma tragdia pode ameaar essa confiana.

programme.title: Conspirao Fatal, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de ser preso e ter sua reputao na Fora Area manchada, um piloto veterano foge da cadeia e parte em busca do verdadeiro criminoso. Ele, ento, descobre uma conspirao terrorista em andamento e somente ele poder evitar um desastre.

programme.title: Chuva Negra, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Nick Conklin e Charlie Vincent so dois detetives da polcia de Nova York que precisam escoltar um assassino at o Japo. Mas o preso escapa e, para captura-lo, eles acabam se envolvendo em uma guerra entre gangues rivais da mfia japonesa.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, um oficial de uma agncia de segurana que regula as viagens no tempo, deve lutar por sua vida contra um poltico sombrio que pretende mudar o passado para controlar o futuro.

programme.title: Jesus, (1999, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: A vida e a poca de Jesus de Nazar, desde a sua humilde origem como carpinteiro at seu destino como filho de Deus, so a razo desta produo. Quando seu pai morre, Maria diz a Jesus que chegou a hora de realizar a sua profecia

programme.title: Paulo de Tarso, (2000, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Esta a histria de Paulo de Tarso, perseguidor de cristos que se tornou no apstolo Paulo depois que Jesus lhe apareceu em uma viso.

programme.title: O Chamado de Deus, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemtica que trabalha em um call center de oraes faz a diferena na vida de outras pessoas, o que a faz lidar com seu passado conturbado quando finalmente um dia percebe a f.

programme.title: O Milagre, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Um novo professor enviado para trabalhar numa pequena vila que sequer possui uma escola. L, ele logo faz amizade com um simptico homem deficiente. O professor rene os moradores para construir uma escola ali para ensinar as crianas e seu novo amigo.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: Prova de Fogo, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capito Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trs. Em casa, ele vive pelas prprias regras. Agora Caleb ter o seu trabalho mais rduo, resgatar o corao de sua esposa.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Frente a Frente, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Cheung Sung-bong um oficial da Unidade Regional de Crime que trabalhou na frente durante muitos anos. O seu protegido, Yau Kong-ngo, respeita-o e consegue chegar at ele. No entanto, o destino coloca-os uns contra os outros.

programme.title: Red Stone: Caada Mortal, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Um adolescente testemunha o assassinato de seu irmo mais velho nas mos de um senhor do crime local. Quando ele encontra uma pedra valiosa que seu irmo havia escondido, ele percebe que um preo logo estar em sua cabea.

programme.title: Rastros de um Crime, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Um limpador de casas envolve-se num crime violento aps ter sido contratado para localizar o filho de um cliente.

programme.title: Tudo por Justia, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: Russell, um operrio da fbrica, tenta proteger seu irmo mais novo, Rodney, de todos os perigos. No entanto, quando este desaparece, Russell decide resolver o problema por conta prpria.

programme.title: Conduo Perigosa, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um ex-piloto de corrida sequestrado por um ladro misterioso e forado a ser o motorista de um crime que os coloca na mira da polcia e da mfia.

programme.title: A Fivela de Abner Outlaw, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Durante uma terrvel tempestade, um serial killer causa estragos dentro de uma priso do Texas.

programme.title: Desejo de Vingana, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Portes do Sol, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Uma organizao paramilitar tem como objetivo conquistar a Arglia e t-la sob controle francs. O grupo constri uma base militar em Om, de onde organiza seus ataques. Cabe a um agente secreto altamente treinado tentar proteger o seu pas.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Fora Para Lutar, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Levi um jovem empresrio que vai se casar com a jornalista Natalie. Quando ela desaparece, ele segue desesperadamente as pistas at descobrir que ela foi sequestrada por um grupo de criminosos.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes
programme.desc: Acreditando que o novo jutsu do naruto est quase pronto, jiraiya vai investigar novas informaes sobre as aes da akatsuki

programme.desc: Bella is heartbroken when the Cullen family decide to move away in order to put a stop to her relationship with vampire Edward. She seeks comfort in friend Jacob, and starts to wonder if there could be more between them.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: As a string of mysterious killings grip Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.desc: Frank Pierce, a paramedic, is on the brink of madness from too many years of saving and losing lives. One fateful night, Frank meets Mary Burke, the daughter of a man Frank tried to save. Together, Frank and Mary confront the ghosts of the past.

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, he uncovers terrifying truths about the island and finds out some places never let you go.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead, (1998, Thriller)

programme.title: The Gentlemen, (2020, Drama)

programme.title: Tromeo and Juliet, (1996, Cult Horror)

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)

programme.title: Evolution, (2001, Science fiction)

programme.title: Dead Ringers, (1988, Thriller)

programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Shaft, (2000, Action)

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Varsity Blues, (1999, Drama)

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organization or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint is your man.

programme.title: Darling Lili, (1970, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Musical superstar Julie Andrews plays Lili Smith, the singing sweetheart who the troops adore. But she has a secret... she's really an enemy agent! And she's just been assigned a new mission: seduce heroic pilot Major William Larrabee (Rock Hudson).

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Manhattan, (1979, Romance)
programme.desc: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Meryl Streep and Mariel Hemingway star in Woody Allen's extraordinary and funny film that explores the embattled life and loves of a successful New York comedy writer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fiery kicks! Sanji's full course of foot techniques!

programme.title: Zoro finally lands a blow against the killer giraffe, but Luffy still cant find a way to break through against Lucci! Can Frank reach Robin before its too late!?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fierce sword attacks! Zoro vs. Kaku, powerful sword fighting showdown!

programme.title: Zoro unleashes a demonic nine sword fighting style on his giraffe opponent, Luffy buys time for Franky by ascending to second gear, and Robin refuses to give up hope of being rescued!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Demon god zoro! An incarnation of asura born from fighting spirit!

programme.title: Spandam cruely drags Robin ever closer to the gates of justice, but the battle takes a turn for the better when the Sniper King makes a surprise appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spandam frightened! The hero on the tower of law!

programme.title: Luffys battle with Lucci reveals the powerful secrets of the rubber mans second gear, and the Spandams thoughtless Buster Call begins with a brutal barrage of cannonballs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin freed! Luffy vs. Lucci, showdown between leaders!

programme.title: When an ancient tree is stolen by a madman with the power to freeze time, Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji track down the culprit in an attempt to save a villages annual festival!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boss luffy is the culprit? Track down the missing great cherry tree!

programme.title: Nami, Sanji, Usopp, Zoro, and company find themselves trapped in a tunnel filled with rapidly rising water. Meanwhile, Luffy musters the strength for one last stand in his battle with Lucci.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I can't protect anyone unless i win! Third gear activated!

programme.title: Flashback to the dark past of Rob Lucci as the young boy learns to dispense a cold, cruel, and brutal brand of justice. Back in real time, Luffys battle with Lucci threatens to destroy the navy fleet.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shivering past! Dark justice and rob lucci!

programme.title: Luffys gigantic attack on Lucci takes a devastating toll on his body, Robin rejoins the fight, and the rest of the Straw Hats struggle to survive underwater!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious mermaid appears? As consciousness fades away

programme.title: Thanks to a little help from what appears to be a mermaid, the Straw Hats find themselves reunited aboard an escape vessel, but the fate of Luffy and the Franky Family is yet to be determined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cannon fire sinks the island! Franky's lamentation!

programme.title: Luffy pushes his body to the breaking point in his battle with Lucci, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to fight off a fleet of Marines until their captain returns if he ever does.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Wait for luffy! Mortal combat on the bridge of hesitation!

programme.title: Luffy lies battered and badly beaten, but Usopps desperate pleas inspire the rubber-man to mount one final, furious attack on Rob Lucci!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fists full of emotion! Luffy unleashes gatling with all his might!

programme.title: With their leader crippled by exhaustion and their escape ship destroyed, the Straw Hats find themselves with only one treacherous option: throwing themselves into the sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: From the sea, a friend arrives! The straw hats share the strongest bond!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are rescued by the unexpected arrival of a dear old friend, but theyll have to avoid a barrage of deadly cannonballs in order to survive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone makes a great escape! The road to victory is for the pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats bid a tearful farewell to the brave little ship that was their home for so very many adventures. Rest in peace, Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thank you, merry! Snow falls over the parting sea!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsne Lupin
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her familyand unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Life, (2017, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A team of scientists whose mission of discovery aboard the International Space Station turns into one of primal fear when they find a rapidly evolving life-form that caused extinction on Mars, and now threatens the crew and all life on Earth.

programme.title: Blue Montana Skies, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry heads North to apprehend fur smugglers plundering the trappers' pelts, and then return to the U.S. When the trail leads to the H-H dude ranch owned by a beautiful gal, the action heats up.

programme.title: Robin Hood Of Texas, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and the Cass County Boys are unjustly arrested as bank bandits. Released by police as decoys to locate the loot, Gene and the boys find themselves in trouble with the real bank robbers.

programme.title: The Shooting, (1968, Drama)
programme.desc: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter, (1964, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot, (2016, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: Stuck in a rut, reporter Kim Baker decides to shake things up by taking a dangerous assignment in Afghanistan. Far from home and completely out of her comfort zone, Kim discovers her true strength as she risks it all to find the next big story.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: What Women Want, (2000, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After an accident, a chauvinistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Theres only one thing keeping aspiring executive Tim from corporate success. He must find the perfect guest to bring to his bosss monthly dinner party, where the winner of the evening is the one who arrives with the biggest buffoon.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa leaves the house after being scolded by Usagi. Chibi-Usa begins to cry, which draws the attention of Rubeus and the Four Spectre Sisters.
programme.sub-title: Protect Chibi-Usa: Clash of the Ten Warriors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru has a dream which a voice warns him that being with Usagi will bring her great misfortune. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon is attacked by a Droid.
programme.sub-title: Awaken the Sleeping Beauty: Mamoru's Distress

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman predicts that Chibi-Usa will appear at Hikawa Shrine. Learning of this, Rubeus orders Koan to go down there and eliminate their target.
programme.sub-title: Battle of the Flames of Love! Mars vs. Koan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami enters the World Chess Tournament, but Bertheir is also there, forcing Ami to transform and reveal her identity as a Sailor Guardian to the enemy.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus gives Petz and Calaveras one last chance to eliminate Rabbit and the Sailor Guardians once and for all.
programme.sub-title: Rubeus the Heartless: The Tragic Sisters

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Eager to return to the future, she steals Usagi's Silver Crystal and flees, only to be ambushed by Rubeus.
programme.sub-title: A UFO Appears: The Sailor Guardians Abducted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus succeeds in taking four of the five Sailor Guardians prisoner. He demands that Sailor Moon bring Chibi-Usa and the Silver Crystal to him.
programme.sub-title: Defeat Rubeus: The Battle in Space

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa falls into a coma. Usagi and the others are at a loss, when a Sailor Guardian calling herself Sailor Pluto suddenly appears before them.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious New Guardian: Sailor Pluto Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Black Moon clan sends down its next operative, Esmeraude, to open the Dark Gate in 20th century Tokyo.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is still depressed over Mamoru calling off their relationship. Ami and Mako try to cheer her up by taking Usagi to a promise ring workshop.
programme.sub-title: Shared Feelings: Usagi and Mamoru in Love Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A strange new flu is causing everyone to get sick, including the Sailor Guardians. Minako takes it upon herself to look after her sick friends.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Artemis is out to prove he is capable after being teased by Luna. He encounters a suspicious-looking man who is gathering stray animals.
programme.sub-title: Artemis's Adventure: The Monster Animal Kingdom

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The school test results are posted, and Ami is at the top of her class. She finds herself becoming isolated after rumors that she cheated on the test.
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Illusion: Ami All Alone

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After being out sick, Chibi-Usa returns to school eager to see her friends. But to her surprise, her friends and teachers begin attacking her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Gate Is Completed? The Targeted Elementary School

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa decides to return to save her mother. With support from the Sailor Guardians and Tuxedo Mask, she opens the Door of Space and Time.
programme.sub-title: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Arriving in the future, the Sailor Guardians stand in shock as they see the ruins of what used to be Crystal Tokyo.
programme.sub-title: The Shocking Future: Dimande's Dark Ambition

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask rescues Sailor Moon from Black Moons castle. But before they can all celebrate, a giant dragon appears to destroy the Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman brainwashes Chibi-Usa and turns her into the Dark Queen. The Sailor Guardians return to present-day Earth to find her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Queen: Birth of Black Lady

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Saphir learns of Wisemans true intentions and tries to warn his brother, only to be attacked by Wiseman himself.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The appearance of the giant Malefic Black Crystal Tower is wreaking havoc. Sailor Moon and the Guardians enter the tower to put an end to this.
programme.sub-title: Believing in Love and the Future: Usagi's Decision

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dark Gate opens, and Dark Energy spreads everywhere. To stop this, the Sailor Guardians must defeat Black Lady.
programme.sub-title: The Final Battle Between Light and Dark: Pledge of Love for the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Peace has returned, and the Sailor Guardians take a moment to look back at their past battles as they prepare for their next challenge.
programme.sub-title: Usagi and the Girls' Resolve: Prelude to a New Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new enemy called the Death Busters appears, whose members aim to get their hands on the talismans that can only be found in pure-hearted humans.
programme.sub-title: Premonition of the Apocalypse: The Mysterious New Guardians Appear

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Silver Crystal loses its shine and that means Usagi cannot transform. Mamoru tries to cheer Usagi up.
programme.sub-title: The Rod of Love is Born: Usagi's New Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Minako sneak off to the arcade to take a break. The girls are approached by a handsome student named Haruka Tenoh, who wishes to join them.
programme.sub-title: A Handsome Boy? Haruka Tenoh's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi asks her friends to help her become a better person worthy of being Mamorus bride.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Idol: The Graceful Genius Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Motokis little sister Unazuki is a pure-hearted girl who dreams of sharing her first kiss with the person she truly loves.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Pure Heart: The Three-Way Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small misunderstanding causes Umino and Naru to believe that the other is no longer interested in them.
programme.sub-title: Let Moon Help with Your Love Problems

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite has a new target: Makoto. When Haruka and Michiru find out, they decide to use Makoto as bait in order to obtain her talisman.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite sets her eyes on Ami, believing that the famous girl genius would possess a pure heart full of confidence.
programme.sub-title: The Labyrinth of Water: Ami Targeted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Realizing that the two mysterious Sailor Guardians Uranus and Neptune are also after the talismans, Kaolinite sends a Daimon to get rid of them.
programme.sub-title: To Save Our Friends: Moon and Uranus Join Forces

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reis been spending the past several nights chanting to learn the meaning behind the strange nightmares shes been having.
programme.sub-title: A Man's Kindness: Yuichiro Heartbroken by Rei

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seeing the happy couples around her, Minako starts questioning her life as a Sailor Guardian and the sacrifices she has to make.
programme.sub-title: I Want to Quit Being a Sailor Guardian: Minako's Dilemma

programme.title: Warrior, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An Iraq War veteran (Tom Hardy) finds himself on a collision course with his estranged brother (Joel Edgerton) when both set their sights on winning a tournament in mixed martial arts.

programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e agora a equipe guy enfrentam cpias idnticas de si mesmos numa batalha.no esconderijo dos akatsuki, deidara e sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki de nove caudas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi! - S1E20
programme.desc: Finalmente a luta entre av e neto comea. Sakura fica confusa com a aparncia estranha de sasori, e vov chiyo explica que aquele hiruko, o corpo que sasori usa para autodefesa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori - S1E21
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo - S1E22
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me - S1E23
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage - S1E24
programme.desc: Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte - S1E25
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem! - S1E26
programme.desc: Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel - S1E27
programme.desc: Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas! - S1E28

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento - S1E30
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado - S1E31

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage - S1E32
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo - S1E33

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada - S1E35

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso - S1E36
